ygData.subject: Re: Prexus Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll be trying out a Wood Elf Ranger. Trying for the name Willows ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support
ygData.messageBody:
I'll be trying out a Wood Elf Ranger. Trying for the name Willows

Leshrec wrote:

> As you guys might have known, the new server Prexus is up already.
> Being a wizard, I have always wanted to play the dark side and have
> always been fascinated by the necromancer's array of spells. Therefore
> i have decided to make a Gnomish Necromancer in the Prexus server and
> see how it goes. Being a new server, less people would probably be
> there, and thus the initial xp gain should be speedy enough. Anyone
> who is willing to switch servers for a while to try out the class they
> always wanted, but not able to bear to leave their main characters can
> always join me. )My nick there would probably be Gandalf but if server
> does not allow it, then Khadgar or Leshrac. Laters! Leshrec

--
